comment: He is an excellent teacher for an intro German class. He values the students interest in the German language and will help you whenever he can. Class participation is a must with his class. If you come to class, talk often and generally try to communicate with him, he is very understanding if you have a hard time with the language.
One of the most enthusiastic professors ever! He's super excited every class and is really focused on his students actually learning the language rather than just passing for the credit.
